title: Unskilled players in ranked
body:
I really loath the fact that i get people who arent skilled enough for champions they use/ranked in general/league in general in ranked games. Why should I be grouped with people who go 0-8 and dont even care? League match making and ranked system is fucked. MMR is shit and people shouldnt just be allowed to play ranked at lvl 30. It should be atleast 300 Normal wins. Also if you do well even in a loss, why should you be punished for your team mates bad play. I love to play league but the other players and community is absolute garbage.
END RANT
